item.title: About
item.description: Sahil is a co-founder of CPC Analytics, a data-driven consulting firm with offices in Berlin and Pune. As a part of CPC, he has consulted leading private and public sector organizations such as Siemens, Mitsubishi Materials, the World Health Organization and GIZ (German International Cooperation). Prior to founding CPC, Sahil worked for GIZ (German International Cooperation) in Tanzania alongside the Prime Minister’s Office, to streamline the revenue collection process in Local Government Agencies.

item.title: Select Publications
item.description: Fast Data for Faster Decision-making: The Utility of High-frequency Economic Indicators ORF Issue Brief No. 372, June 2020, Observer Research Foundation Co-Authored with Sanjana Krishnan and Pooja Verulkar 50 Days of Lockdown: Measuring India’s Success in Arresting COVID-19 ORF Special Report No. 107, May 2020, Observer Research Foundation. Co-Authored with Sanjana Krishnan and Shardul Manurkar Building India’s Global Health Strategy: Beyond the Role of ‘Pharmacist of the World’ ORF Special Report No.
